title: Donald Trump state visit: UK leader rejects calls to cancel offer
shortDescription: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Sunday dismissed calls to cancel the offer of a state visit to President Donald Trump.

title: Dismantling agencies and firing workers: Trump redefines presidential power
shortDescription: Trump claims he has the executive power to dismantle agencies and fire thousands of workers. Will court fights redefine his relations with Congress?

title: Trump pushes US timber production, forest management in new order
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order that looks to federal forest management following the devastating Los Angeles wildfires.

title: Trump takes back property seized by FBI, White House says
shortDescription: The FBI handed back boxes of materials that President Donald Trump had taken to his Mar-a-Lago Florida estate upon leaving the White House in 2021.

title: Rubio says Zelenskyy should apologize after argument with Trump and Vance

title: Watch the video: Trump and Zelenskyy argue over war with Russia

title: U.S. support for Ukraine in doubt after Trump-Zelenskyy public brawl
shortDescription: Ukraine's military alliance with the U.S. is in doubt after President Donald Trump publicly brawled with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: Trump admin resumes school disability rights probes after pause
shortDescription: The Education Department's civil rights division has resumed investigations into disability-related discrimination complaints at schools, a memo says.

title: $25K to resign by Monday: Trump admin offers Ed Dept staff buyouts
shortDescription: In an email obtained by USA TODAY, the Education Department offered employees $25,000 to take a buyout ahead of a "significant" staff reduction.

title: FBI returns to Trump boxes recovered from Mar-a-Lago
shortDescription: The FBI handed back boxes of materials that President Donald Trump had taken to his Mar-a-Lago Florida estate upon leaving the White House.

title: Zelenskyy is asked if he owes an apology to Trump. He says 'no'.

title: Trump, Zelenskyy’s tense Oval clash stirs doubts

title: Trump says Zelenskyy isn't 'ready for peace'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said President Zelenskyy is not ready for peace if America is involved." Zelenskyy says otherwise.

title: When is Trump addressing Congress? And why isn't it a State of the Union?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was invited to address Congress in early March. Here's why it won't technically be a State of the Union address.

title: No suit, no lunch, no respect: Zelenskyy-Trump feud began with fashion dig
shortDescription: Zelenskyy, whose country was invaded by Russia three years ago in an ongoing conflict, has been known for his casual style.

title: No, Trump did not raise drug prices up to 4,200% | Fact check
shortDescription: An executive order by Trump rolled back some efforts by the Biden administration to control Medicare costs but it didn't change drug price caps.
